com.paydiant.android.logging

Class SDKLoggingHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paydiant.android.logging.SDKLoggingHelper

  • public class SDKLoggingHelper
extends Object
    A helper class to provide support for internally logging successful/failed SDK events.
    Since:
    4.6.0.1
    Author:
    Paydiant

      • setAndroidContextWrapper

        Parameters:

      • getSDKLoggingUtility

        public ISDKLoggingUtility getSDKLoggingUtility()
        Returns the ISDKLoggingUtility instance to log SDK events internally. Unless a custom ISDKLoggingUtility instance is set, this will return an instance of the PaydiantLoggingUtility class.

        Note: Internal logging feature will be disabled until PaydiantLoggingUtility.init(android.content.ContextWrapper, int, boolean) method is being called or a custom ISDKLoggingUtility is set.
        Returns:
        an instance of ISDKLoggingUtility to use for internal logging.

      • setSDKLoggingUtility

        public void setSDKLoggingUtility(ISDKLoggingUtility sdkLoggingUtility)
        Sets a custom ISDKLoggingUtility instance to log SDK events internally.
        Parameters:
        sdkLoggingUtility - Custom instance of the ISDKLoggingUtility.

      • getLogMessageProvider

        public LogMessageProvider getLogMessageProvider()
        Gets the log message provider.
        Returns:
        the log message provider

      • setLogMessageProvider

        public void setLogMessageProvider(LogMessageProvider logMessageProvider)
        Sets the log message provider.
        Parameters:
        logMessageProvider - the new log message provider
